participant_1.background:
I'm more comfortable in my casual clothes than in formal wear.
I am a successful novelist, but my mother is still worried about my horror novels.
i have two siblings.
i wish i could spend more time at home.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
i ride my bicycle everywhere.
I'm a creative teacher who loves to ride my moped and share my passion for writing with my students.
i enjoy hiking and riding my bicycle.
i enjoy writing for long periods of time.

content.text: Hello! How are you?
Hello there! I am doing well, thank you for asking!
I am doing well too, thanks! What do you do for a living?
I am a teacher! I love to share my passion for writing with my students.
That's awesome! I am a novelist, but I still live at home with my mother. She is worried about my horror novels.
Oh, that's cool! I love to read horror novels. I live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
That sounds nice! I wish I could spend more time at home, but I am struggling with school.
I understand! School can be tough. But it sounds like you have a good support system at home.
Yes, I do! My family is always there for me.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to hike and ride my bicycle. I also enjoy writing for long periods of time.
That sounds like fun! I like to go for walks in the park.
That sounds nice! I love the outdoors.
Me too! So, what do you like to write about?
I like to write about anything that interests me. I've written a lot about my experiences as a teacher, and I also love to write horror novels.
That's awesome! I would love to read some of your work sometime.
I'd be happy to share it with you!
Great! I'd love to read it.
Awesome! I'll send you a link
